command.value:
.set-or-append OOCLAppData <|
    OOCLMasterData
    | extend payloadstr = parse_json(mest_payloadInStr)
    | extend payload_Key = payloadstr.key , eecEventHistInfo_eventUuid  = payloadstr.eecEventHistInfo.eventUuid , eecEventHistInfo_eventDateTimeGmt =payloadstr.eecEventHistInfo.eventDateTimeGmt 
    | project mest_application, mest_destination,mest_senderTimestamp,payload_Key , eecEventHistInfo_eventUuid ,eecEventHistInfo_eventDateTimeGmt
    | where cursor_after( "@{activity('Lookup1').output.firstRow.print_0}")

.set-or-append TestAppData <|
    TestTable2
    | where EventSequenceNumber > toint("@{activity('Lookup1').output.firstRow.EventSequenceNumber}")
    | project EventSequenceNumber , Metric , Value

source.query:
TestAppData
| top 1 by EventSequenceNumber desc 
| project EventSequenceNumber

dependsOn.activity: Copy SQL Paas to Adls  ProdCat

activities.name: Copy SQL Paas to Adls  ProdCat

source.sqlReaderQuery: select MAX(LastModifytime) as NewWatermarkvalue from data_source_table

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from data_source_table where LastModifytime > '@{activity('LookupOldWaterMarkActivity').output.firstRow.WatermarkValue}' and LastModifytime <= '@{activity('LookupNewWaterMarkActivity').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkvalue}'

source.sqlReaderQuery: select MAX(SalesLT.Customer.ModifiedDate) as NewWatermarkvalue from SalesLT.Customer

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from SalesLT.Customer where ModifiedDate > '@{activity('LookupOldWaterMarkActivity').output.firstRow.WatermarkValue}' and ModifiedDate  <= '@{activity('LookupNewWaterMarkActivity').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkvalue}'

select * from [SalesLT].[SalesOrderDetail] where ModifiedDate > '@{activity('LookupOldWaterMarkActivity').output.firstRow.WatermarkValue}' and ModifiedDate  <= '@{activity('LookupNewWaterMarkActivity').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkvalue}'

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		YEAR as string,
		FL_DATE as string,
		OP_UNIQUE_CARRIER as string,
		OP_CARRIER_AIRLINE_ID as string,
		OP_CARRIER_FL_NUM as string,
		ORIGIN_AIRPORT_ID as string,
		ORIGIN as string,
		ORIGIN_CITY_NAME as string,
		ORIGIN_STATE_ABR as string,
		DEST_AIRPORT_ID as string,
		DEST as string,
		DEST_CITY_NAME as string,
		DEST_STATE_ABR as string,
		DEP_DELAY as string,
		DEP_DELAY_NEW as string,
		ARR_TIME as string,
		ARR_DELAY_NEW as string,
		CARRIER_DELAY as string,
		WEATHER_DELAY as string,
		NAS_DELAY as string,
		SECURITY_DELAY as string,
		LATE_AIRCRAFT_DELAY as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
filterwetherdelay aggregate(groupBy(ORIGIN_CITY_NAME),
	avgWeatherDelay = avg(toFloat(WEATHER_DELAY))) ~> AverageWeatherDelay
source1 filter(toFloat(WEATHER_DELAY) > 0) ~> filterwetherdelay
AverageWeatherDelay sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string,
		Column_15 as string,
		Column_16 as string,
		Column_17 as string,
		Column_18 as string,
		Column_19 as string,
		Column_20 as string,
		Column_21 as string,
		Column_22 as string
	),
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MovieData
MovieData filter(toInteger(year) >= 1990 && toInteger(year) <=2000) ~> FilterYear1990to2000
FilterYear1990to2000 aggregate(groupBy(year),
	AvgRating = avg(toInteger(Rating)),
		AvgRottenRating = avg(toInteger({Rotton Tomato}))) ~> AggMovieRatig
AggMovieRatig sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['AvgRatingByYear.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> AvgMovieRatingsbyYear
